text: Belvédère is a commune. It is found in the region Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur in the Alpes-Maritimes department in the south of France. == Other websites == * & (Occitan) Dances and traditional musics in Belvédère : farandole and passa-carriera * & (Occitan) Chimes from County of Nice : tirignoun (chime) from Belvédère. ==References== Category:Communes in Alpes-Maritimes
title: Belvédère
